item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: I've seem this before, and I've often wondered if the camera (or the eye) has to be a certain height and angle to the drawing to make it work. Are these photos just taken from the exact correct perspective to make the drawings look amazing? If you were much shorter or taller than the photographer, would they look the same?
item.content:encoded: I’ve seem this before, and I’ve often wondered if the camera (or the eye) has to be a certain height and angle to the drawing to make it work. Are these photos just taken from the exact correct perspective to make the drawings look amazing? If you were much shorter or taller than the photographer, would they look the same?
